hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util

Class DefaultCloseableObserver<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util.DefaultCloseableObserver<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the observed element type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseObserver, Cancelable, CloseableObserver<T>, Observer<T>, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class DefaultCloseableObserver<T>
extends Object
implements CloseableObserver<T>, Cancelable
    Class to wrap a raw observer and provide it with enforced event-sequence constraints and closeability.
    • Fixed order: next()* [error()|finish()]?
    • After finish or terminate, subsequent calls to the base methods are ignored
    Since:
    0.97
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2013.01.09.
